metadata.dc:description: Health services research is a basic tool for the development of the National Health System. This paper presents the results of a national survey on research projects carried out in Mexican health institutions, as well as in universities and research centers, from 1984 to 1991.
metadata.dc:title: Tendencias de investigación en servicios de salud en México, 1984-1991.
[Trends in health services research in Mexico, 1984-1991].
